CustomField.formula: IF(AND( ISPICKVAL(Passport__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(Degree_Transcript__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(Degree_Certificate__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(Proof_of_Exemptions__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(Visa_Confirmation__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(EU_Settlement_Evidence__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(BCAT__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(Inn_of_Court__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(Certificate_of_Academic_Standing__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(Faculty_Approval__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(ACCA_Status_Report__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(School_Leaving_Level_3_Certificate__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(Highest_Qualification_Certificate__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(Highest_Qualification_Transcript__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(Confirmation_of_Contact_Details__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(English_Language_Certificate__c, "") ), NULL, IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Passport__c, "Outstanding"), ISPICKVAL(Degree_Transcript__c, "Outstanding"), ISPICKVAL(Degree_Certificate__c, "Outstanding"), ISPICKVAL(Proof_of_Exemptions__c, "Outstanding"), ISPICKVAL(Visa_Confirmation__c, "Outstanding"), ISPICKVAL(EU_Settlement_Evidence__c, "Outstanding"), ISPICKVAL(BCAT__c, "Outstanding"), ISPICKVAL(Inn_of_Court__c, "Outstanding"), ISPICKVAL(Certificate_of_Academic_Standing__c, "Outstanding"), ISPICKVAL(Faculty_Approval__c, "Outstanding"), ISPICKVAL(ACCA_Status_Report__c, "Outstanding"), ISPICKVAL(School_Leaving_Level_3_Certificate__c, "Outstanding"), ISPICKVAL(Highest_Qualification_Certificate__c, "Outstanding"), ISPICKVAL(Highest_Qualification_Transcript__c, "Outstanding"), ISPICKVAL(Confirmation_of_Contact_Details__c, "Outstanding"), ISPICKVAL(English_Language_Certificate__c, "Outstanding") ), "Outstanding", IF( AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Passport__c, "Validated"), ISPICKVAL(Passport__c, "Not Applicable")), OR(ISPICKVAL(Degree_Transcript__c, "Validated"), ISPICKVAL(Degree_Transcript__c, "Not Applicable")), OR(ISPICKVAL(Degree_Certificate__c, "Validated"), ISPICKVAL(Degree_Certificate__c, "Not Applicable")), OR(ISPICKVAL(Proof_of_Exemptions__c, "Validated"), ISPICKVAL(Proof_of_Exemptions__c, "Not Applicable")), OR(ISPICKVAL(Visa_Confirmation__c, "Validated"), ISPICKVAL(Visa_Confirmation__c, "Not Applicable")), OR(ISPICKVAL(EU_Settlement_Evidence__c, "Validated"), ISPICKVAL(EU_Settlement_Evidence__c, "Not Applicable")), OR(ISPICKVAL(BCAT__c, "Validated"), ISPICKVAL(BCAT__c, "Not Applicable")), OR(ISPICKVAL(Inn_of_Court__c, "Validated"), ISPICKVAL(Inn_of_Court__c, "Not Applicable")), OR(ISPICKVAL(Certificate_of_Academic_Standing__c, "Validated"), ISPICKVAL(Certificate_of_Academic_Standing__c, "Not Applicable")), OR(ISPICKVAL(Faculty_Approval__c, "Validated"), ISPICKVAL(Faculty_Approval__c, "Not Applicable")), OR(ISPICKVAL(ACCA_Status_Report__c, "Validated"), ISPICKVAL(ACCA_Status_Report__c, "Not Applicable")), OR(ISPICKVAL(School_Leaving_Level_3_Certificate__c, "Validated"), ISPICKVAL(School_Leaving_Level_3_Certificate__c, "Not Applicable")), OR(ISPICKVAL(Highest_Qualification_Certificate__c, "Validated"), ISPICKVAL(Highest_Qualification_Certificate__c, "Not Applicable")), OR(ISPICKVAL(Highest_Qualification_Transcript__c, "Validated"), ISPICKVAL(Highest_Qualification_Transcript__c, "Not Applicable")), OR(ISPICKVAL(Confirmation_of_Contact_Details__c, "Validated"), ISPICKVAL(Confirmation_of_Contact_Details__c, "Not Applicable")), OR(ISPICKVAL(English_Language_Certificate__c, "Validated"), ISPICKVAL(English_Language_Certificate__c, "Not Applicable")) ), "Validated", "Submitted")))
CustomField.label: OLD Registration Status
